categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Serenity Meeks was a deck officer in the Rebel Alliance who served at the Alliance's Echo Base on the planet Hoth. During the Galactic Empire's attack on the base in 3 ABY, Meeks was among a number of deck officers who directed personnel to transports, like the GR-75 medium transport Bright Hope.
Serenity Meeks appeared in the short story "A Good Kiss," written by C.B. Lee as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
